column5: Hey folks, today is the big day for me and my fiance'.  we are getting married today at 6:30.  the wedding is going to take place over looking the ohio river.  i tried to talk her into leaving by boat after the ceremony, but she didnt bite on that idea   she said she didnt mind going fishing with me every now and then, but it wasnt going to be on our wedding day!  For the honeymoon we are going to cancun for 7 nights, for a little fun and sun, a lot of cold drinks, sight seeing, relaxing, and best of all a charter trip of fishing  .  i also plan on doing a little fishing from the beach and lagoon in the mornings, got the gear packed a 12' telescoping surf rod, a 4 piece ugly stick and some crank baits,grubs and spoons and some in-line spinners.  i hope to have plenty of pics to post when we get back.  best of luck for all you folks heading to the g2g, have fun and be safe.   jason
Congrats to you both.  Best Wishes for a long happy life together.  By 4:00p.m. today you should be feeling a bit out of body  lol    Just keep your sights on that "honeymoon".  Have a great time.
Congrats to you and your Dearheart, Jason. The keyword here is 'compromise'. If you both can do that, you will last forever.  Be well and have a great time in the South.
congrats oxcowboy.... i've been married a whole 2 weeks today and the wife is training me good  Have fun on your honeymoon!!
Congratulations!!  Wishing you both a lifetime of happiness!!
The pecking order has been set. And it can never, ever be reversed from now until eternity. You'll find out just exactly what I'm talking about in due time. But congrats anyways.
congrats,,,and may you grow old happily together!!

well folks its about 3 am just got home we killed off nearly 46 gallons of beer, not sure what that translates into liters, but a good time was had by all.   i will post a full report wh3n we get back .  thanks for the well wishes,  jason
Now that's an addiction...coming home on wedding night to post on OFC...hmmm  Congrats...  Maureen
Best of luck bud,enjoy the honeymoon and try to talk her into a Lakair cameo! Joe
LOL congrats! Ohio river doesn`t strike me as a good destination, should have tried something a little more romantic? Like the French River? Have fun!
Congrats enjoy your 3 rings ,the engagement Ring ,the wedding ring and the suffering  enjoy the honeymoon and new bride  Have a great trip I am looking forward to the report.MTP
Congrats and have fun on the honeymoon.
